case.state: Ooh! Is this the Ecaflip dimension?
I've travelled all over the World of Twelve, but I've never heard of this game!
I don't know where I am, but somebody is going to the dungeons for Criminal Mis-Use of a Zaap.
I, ah, think I took a wrong turn at that last Zaap portal.
~cards.ifPlural(Get rid of these ~cards.text~.|I'll get rid of this one.)~
Did you think a princess would just get naked?
A princess does not just get naked!
I'll just sit over here then?
Hey Kira: See? I can crush a kokonut flat with my palms! Do you like my hands?
Hey Kira, you sure like to talk about hands. I've been told I have the largest hands of anyone in this establishment. Do you like my hands?
Hey Kira, do you know what they say about Sadida with big gloves? I don't know either -- I can never find gloves that fit...
...Game's still nothing compared to a good Boufball match.
I've got the winning hand right here.
You know, this joint doesn't compare at all to Alibert's bar.
I've got the winning hand right here.
Perfect cards for the perfect lady.
No poison rose could stop me now!
I hope you didn't count me out yet!
Heh. Looks like I'm not out yet.
Great. Now let's make this blossom.
This time I've got the win for sure.
Did you think a princess would just get naked?
A princess does not just get naked!
I think I might need to sit down.
Hey Kira: See? I can crush a kokonut flat with my palms! Do you like my hands?
Hey Kira, you sure like to talk about hands. I've been told I have the largest hands of anyone in this establishment. Do you like my hands?
Well, this promises to break my streak.
At this table, even these might win.
I think even this hand can beat you, given how you played before.
Ga-ah! I could have had a -- Ga-ah!
OK. Right. Yes. I've got this.
I beat the Black Crow; I can do this.
Ga-ah! I could have had a -- Ga-ah!
OK. Right. Good. I've got this.
I can make do with these.
If I could beat Harebourg, I can make these cards work.
I've saved the world too many times to deserve hands like this.
So, ah... this game has a maximum number of rounds, right?
Ah.. of course I wanted those cards. Right! All part of my strategy.
But what about my flush? I had a flush for sure.
(Not these cards again. Didn't I just get them last hand?)
It'll work. I'll make it work, by Sadida.
(I'll distract them and maybe they'll mis-play.)
This will work. It had better work.
Pretty sure I got this hand last time.
Right. Time to get out of this jam.
This ... could have gone better. Yes.
I really could have used better, there.
This dealer... Ne rien savoir faire de ses dix doigts...
This is going to be close...
But what about my full house? I had it!
Really could have used better. It's all on the line now.
It's not easy being a princess.
A princess does not just get naked!
Did you think a princess would just get naked?
Hey Kira: See? I can crush a kokonut flat with my palms! Do you like my hands?
Hey Kira, you sure like to talk about hands. I've been told I have the largest hands of anyone in this establishment. Do you like my hands?
Ruel! I see you back there! ... he's over there isn't he?
More trash cards. Maybe Rubilax is behind this?
Is Ruel the dealer? Someone is being stingy with the good cards.
Are you sure I can't exchange again?
Wait. Did I give you the right cards?
Pretty sure these are the cards I just discarded.
Wait! I didn't want to discard that one!
I should have tossed the whole thing.
Ye-e-ep. Should have kept that one.
Enutrof! Why must you be like this?
What is this? These are not the cards I wanted!
I fold. ... What do you mean I can't fold?!
This hand stinks! Like a Boowulf!
I played that hand like one of Adale's decisions.
Is this a prank? If it is, it's not funny!
I wish Yugo could portal these cards away.
Pretty sure Enutrof is laughing at me right now.
What would the people of Sadida think if they saw me like this?
Well, those aren't going to help.
Wait! Give me those cards back! They were better!
A big fat Thhbbbbttt to the dealer!
To the Shukrute with these cards!
Amalia Sheran Sharm, daughter of King Sheran Sharm, protector of the world's forests. Enchanté.
Hey Marinette, do I detect the dulcet tones of the accent of Amakna?
Since she asked nicely, Jura gets flowers. The rest of you get nothing!
Typical shushu bluster from Veran. To which I say Thbbbtt!
After I trounce you at cards, I'll make sure you get stuffed back in your harp where you belong, demon! Thbbbt!
Ugh, my head. I call a two-hour delay to go take a nap.
Stop the room please, I want to get off.
Could you all stop violently spinning for a moment? Thanks.
So... what sort of grub do they serve in this place? Something smells fantastic!
I lost with THREE OF A KIND?
I had three of a kind! What sorcery is this?
Aw! But I had two pair!
Well, I guess it was inevitable.
I suppose one screw-up is acceptable.
How come it's only me that has to strip? I think this game is rigged...
It's you, isn't it, ~player~! You're slipping me the bad cards!
... You turned on the Debug Mode, didn't you? Don't deny it!
I have to go first? That seems hardly fair!
No worries. I'm still dominating this game.
Don't get cocky! I've only just begun!
Yeah, yeah, but I'm still winning.
I don't think you're ready for this.
Is this what you came for, ~player~? I'm still going to beat you, you know.
I lost with THREE OF A KIND?
What. But I had two pair!
Aw! But I had two pair!
Rats. And I was hoping for a shut-out.
Well, there goes my winning streak.
How come it's only me that has to strip? I think this game is rigged...
It's you, isn't it, ~player~! You're slipping me the bad cards!
... You turned on the Debug Mode, didn't you? Don't deny it!
I have to go first? That seems hardly fair!
You have no idea how many kamas people would pay to see me like this.
You know how many kamas they'd pay in Brakmar to see me like this? Well, it's a lot.
Now I see why that ridiculous Eliacube was such a big deal. I could use ten minutes of rewind right about now.
I lost with THREE OF A KIND?
I had two pair! Impossi- er, very unlikely!
Aw! But I had two pair!
It's a raging crown fire over here.
How come it's only me that has to strip? I think this game is rigged...
It's you, isn't it, ~player~! You're slipping me the bad cards!
... You turned on the Debug Mode, didn't you? Don't deny it!
I have to go first? That seems hardly fair!
Well, I'm just giving you a false sense of security. Yeah!
Don't think this means anything! I'm just warming up.
I suppose I've had worse days, but --- gah!
This time I resolve to play better!
This is spiraling out of hand!
Well, this has gone all sorts of wrong.
A princess doesn't deserve this outcome!
(I'm starting to think Faye is hiding extra cards...)
(...did I see Faye pocket an extra card?)
Jura, your home planet has no greenery? Is it from having to power the spaceships?
Well, Jura, your people who fly spaceships, and wrecked all the life on their home planet to do it, sounds like a story I've heard...
But Jura, a planet with no forests is not really a home planet, is it?
Just be careful with it -- this bag is expensive!
Ah -- The skirt, then, I guess.
Pour être honnête, these boots don't do much anyway.
Pour être honnête, these are pretty useless boots, anyway.
Well, maybe a few blooms can go.
Aw, Jura, all my clothes are made of plants! You counted a sword as a layer! Are your clothes made of swords?
I use flowers because I don't have a sword to count as extra, Jura.
Hey now, I saw you passing off your sword a layer earlier, Jura.
Anyhow: Bag here! Don't worry all, it's not just an accessory. It's much bigger on the inside!
(If Mahiru snaps a photo right now, it's the brambles for her!)
Rangez la caméra! Tout de suite!
I've never heard of this "Viridi," Pit. She sounds like a jerk.
I've never heard of this "Viridi," Pit, but if Evangelyne caught wind of this game, she'd kill me, too.
Minor? It's much bigger on the inside!
It's not just an accessory! There's a whole wardrobe in there.
Just like a beach day, right?
Je suis trop sexy pour cette chemise.
You thought I was finished! But no!
Nothing of consequence! Let's move on, shall we?
I'm not cheating! Jura likes my flowers. ~player~ needs to learn to appreciate nature!
See, I'm not cheating! Just ask Jura! Ha-haaa!
I'm not cheating! Jura likes my flowers. The rest of you Iop-brains need to learn to appreciate nature!
See, I'm not cheating! Just ask Jura! Ha-haaa!
Cheating? Yeah, you gobbal-sniffers can kiss my butt!
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
Can you beat a flush? I think not.
Of course, I had four of a kind.
Only fitting that the princess should have the royal flush.
I had a straight. You had no chance.
Nice try, but I had a straight.
Thought your three of a kind was good enough, ~name~? Hah!
Yeah, I can beat two pair.
Three of a kind and still lost? How'd you piss off Enutrof?
...Then again, Count Harebourg was really easy. I mopped the floor with him.
Wow, I'm really crushing you guys.
Is Enutrof smiling on me, or are you all just this terrible?
Tu veux un coup de main?
Take off something good, ~player~. A princess demands it!
I knew I'd beat you all along.
Wow, ~name~, those are some bad cards.
That hand was pure gobbal feed all around, I guess.
Nice try ~name~, but you had nothing!
I know a guy who punches out demons for fun. Hey ~player~, shall we find out if your body is as good as his?
Aw, your high card is adorable.
High card? I guess Enutrof doesn't like you today.
I hope you don't get too cold, ~player~.
Is that all it takes to beat you, ~player~?
How did you get this far, playing like that?
I've got you figured out now, ~player~.
Apres la pluie, le beau temps.
If you want the rest of these blooms gone, you need to play better than that!
Thought you had it there didn't you, ~player~?
You better not throw the game now, ~player~!
What's the matter ~player~, losing your touch?
I'm not cheating! Jura likes my flowers. ~player~ needs to learn to appreciate nature!
See, I'm not cheating! Just ask Jura! Ha-haaa!
I'm not cheating! Jura likes my flowers. The rest of you Iop-brains need to learn to appreciate nature!
See, I'm not cheating! Just ask Jura! Ha-haaa!
Did you expect me to lose that easily, Iop-brain?
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
Hey wait -- it's Zone-Tan! I heard about your videos of me and Eva!
I got outplayed by Captain Monosyllable. Yeesh.
Wait, ~name~, are you another one of those crazy Justice Knights?
You're a legendary hero, right ~name~? Our world could use more of those.
A robot? Where's the Xelor hiding?
I'm sure you'd fit right in, on my world.

state.text: So, Pit, you're some sort of deity, right? You seem a lot less... annoying than some other gods I've met.

case.state: Can you beat a flush? I think not.
Yes ~name~, that is four of a kind you're looking at. Of course.
Only fitting that the princess should have the royal flush.
I had a straight. You had no chance.
Nice try, but I had a straight.
You had three of a kind? No problem!
Sure, I can beat two pair.
Three of a kind and still lost? How'd you piss off Enutrof?
...Then again, Count Harebourg was really easy. I mopped the floor with him.
Wow, I'm really crushing you guys.
Is Enutrof smiling on me, or are you all just this terrible?
Tu veux un coup de main?
Be brave! Show us what you're made of!
I've spent years travelling with boys. I promise I've seen it all before.
Wow, ~name~, those are some bad cards.
That hand was pure gobbal feed all around, I guess.
Nice try ~name~, but you had nothing!
I know a guy who punches out demons for fun. Hey ~name~, shall we find out if your body is as good as his?
Aw, your high card is adorable.
High card? I guess Enutrof doesn't like you today.
As long as it's not me again.
Apres la pluie, le beau temps.
It's only fair that you get naked too, ~name~.
Anyone know if you can get a decent whirloin steak in this joint?
Yeah, yeah, get on with it.
I could grow a few more vines if it would encourage you to lose more...
I'm not cheating! Jura likes my flowers. ~player~ needs to learn to appreciate nature!
See, I'm not cheating! Just ask Jura! Ha-haaa!
I'm not cheating! Jura likes my flowers. The rest of you Iop-brains need to learn to appreciate nature!
See, I'm not cheating! Just ask Jura! Ha-haaa!
Cheating? Yeah, you gobbal-sniffers can kiss my butt!
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
Hey! Watch where you're pointing that, ~name~!
So what happens to your clothes when you strip, ~name~? I bet genuine ghost clothes would make a big splash in Bonta...
I better not see any cameras around here, ~name~!
You'd better not be recording this, ~name~!
I got beat by somebody who wore only four layers?
Can you beat a flush? I think not.
Yes ~name~, that is four of a kind you're looking at. Of course.
Only fitting that the princess should have the royal flush.
I had a straight. You had no chance.
Nice try, but I had a straight.
Bet you thought your three of a kind was the winning hand, ~name~. Hah!
Sure, I can beat two pair.
You had two pair, ~name~? Not good enough, I'm afraid.
Three of a kind and still lost? How'd you piss off Enutrof?
...Then again, Count Harebourg was really easy. I mopped the floor with him.
Wow, I'm really crushing you guys.
Is Enutrof smiling on me, or are you all just this terrible?
Wow, ~name~, those are some bad cards.
That hand was pure gobbal feed all around, I guess.
Nice try ~name~, but you had nothing!
I won with that? ... Well of course I did!
If you want, we can go shopping later to replace whatever you take off!
I was hoping it would be you.
Aw, your high card is adorable.
High card? I guess Enutrof doesn't like you today.
Show us something good, and I'll take you shopping later.
We'll have you out of those clothes yet, ~player~.
~player~, you need to play better than that to beat me!
Gotta play better than that to beat me!
Thought you had it there, didn't you, ~player~?
Ah... glad you lost this round... ~player~...
~player~'s going to choke and lose it all at the end, calling it now.
I'm not cheating! Jura likes my flowers. ~player~ needs to learn to appreciate nature!
See, I'm not cheating! Just ask Jura! Ha-haaa!
I'm not cheating! Jura likes my flowers. The rest of you Iop-brains need to learn to appreciate nature!
See, I'm not cheating! Just ask Jura! Ha-haaa!
What do you mean cheating? Iop-brain!
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
Hey! Watch it with that weapon!
Was that an ice arrow? Who's shooting ice arrows?
Hey wait -- it's Zone-Tan! I heard about your videos of me and Eva!
Is it that hot in here, ~name~?
Was that an ice arrow? Who's shooting ice arrows?
Hey Raven, we can't let Zone-Tan over there beat us! She's probably recording this!
Hey Raven, we'd better not lose to Zone-Tan. Or lewd material starring us will be everywhere! ...Again!
You'll have to do better than that to beat me, demon.
Huh. I thought ~player~ would be next.
I thought it was going to be Veran this round.
You thought you could beat a princess?!
You're not getting rid of these flowers yet!
Hmmf! A demon can't beat me!
I'm making this a little more interesting.
Uh oh, Veran's game is slipping.
Looks like it's the ghost's turn. ... You're a ghost, right?
You lose this round... Beatrix, was it?
So, ~name~, you defeat vampires? I know a guy who probably needs defeating again. What are your rates?
~name~, don't take this the wrong way, but that thing you parked out back...
So uh... ~name~? How much do you happen to be into Stasis ?
Well I wasn't going to say anything, but I wondered why you showed up naked.
Ooh, ~name~! That style is in, in Brakmar!

state.text: Jolyne, who does your hair? Everyone knows green is the height of fashion!
Now here is a girl who knows how to coif. Green hair is in, am I right? Of course I'm right.
You and I, Jolyne: Jade-haired fashion superstars.

case.state: Your blue form is much more friendly, ~name~.
I like your blue much better!
Hey, you brought a camera? Just what are you planning?
What Iop-brain thought it was a good idea to allow cameras in here?
Wait a minute -- Why did you pick ~name~ to play with us, ~player~? She brought a camera!
Eniripsa has followers on other worlds in the Krosmos, I guess.
(This Iop-brain with the glove for a hat seems to be throwing the game...)
Why did you pick a demon to play with us, ~player~?
~name~, you're the mysterious silent type, huh?
(Hmm. Is ~name~ another victim of the notorious Voice Thief?)
Wait -- you're a god too? You mean to tell me there are thirteen gods?
Mushroom kingdom, eh? I think that technically makes Sadida your liege lords.

state.text: ~name~, you're a warrior, right? You're built like a warrior.
~name~, you're a warrior, right? You look like you know your way around a sword.

case.state: Are you a shushu guardian, ~name~? That weapon you were carrying... changes...
~name~, I don't even think Sadlygrove is as muscular as you.
Er.. ~name~... that, ah, weapon you walked in with, I hope you're keeping it away from any Shushus.
You're a genie, ~name~? Are you the kind that eats money? I hope you're not the kind that eats money.
Well, you seem a friendly sort of genie. Which is good, because I didn't bring any chocolate.
~name~, you keep magic in balance? What a strange notion.

state.text: Do the trick with the purple again!
What item will she poof into butterflies next?

case.state: ~name~, you balance magic? What a strange notion.
Leave it to the Eniripsa to be last standing.
Bloody gods. Seems I can't stop being out-shone by them.
I think I'm OK with being beat by a mushroom. If you know what I mean.
(This "Inventory" seems to collect a lot of Rogues.)
So, ~name~...it seems you're some type of Rogue?

state.text: Green is always a good look, ~name~.

case.state: ~name~, you're the mysterious silent type, huh?
(Hmm. Is ~name~ another victim of the notorious VoiceThief?)
(Hmm. Is ~name~ another victim of the notorious Voice Thief?)
Can you beat a flush? I think not.
Yes ~name~, that is four of a kind you're looking at. Of course.
Only fitting that the princess should have the royal flush.
I had a straight. You had no chance.
Nice try, but I had a straight.
Your three of a kind isn't good enough!
You had three of a kind? I had better.
Sure, I can beat two pair.
Tch! Too bad your two pair didn't work out!
Three of a kind and still lost? How'd you piss off Enutrof?
I wondered why you showed up naked!
...Then again, Count Harebourg was really easy. I mopped the floor with him.
Wow, I'm really crushing you guys.
Is Enutrof smiling on me, or are you all just this terrible?
You'll have to do better than that to beat me, ~name~.
Let me see if I can guess what you'll choose next.
Huh. I thought ~player~ would be next.
Wow, ~name~, those are some bad cards.
That hand was pure gobbal feed all around, I guess.
Nice try ~name~, but you had nothing!
I wonder if your body is as good as my guardian's.. let's see.
Aw, your high card is adorable.
Only high card? I guess Enutrof doesn't like you today.
Well, when you share rooming arrangements with your bodyguard, you see this thing all the time.
I thought it was going to be ~name~ this round.
You thought you could beat a princess?!
You're not getting rid of these flowers yet!
I'm making this a little more interesting.
Will ~player~ hold out long enough to beat ~name~?
I could really go for a camonkbert.
So... when does Ush leap out and start gloating about how I lost his clever game?
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
All lies and slander, I assure you.
You fight your neighbors regularly? Rough town.
Hey Kira, don't worry -- Skull-pin designs are the height of fashion.
Nothing says fashionable like a skull on your outfit. Am I right? I'm right.
Kira, I just love that tie. Skull motifs are the peak of fashion, of course.
... Neighbors? The people next door? You fight them?
I absolutely love your tie, Kira. Everyone knows skull motifs are the height of fashion.
A man who wears a skull on his tie is a man who knows how to dress.
Oh well. I was hoping for more.
You can run, but you can't hide!
Don't you have a sense of adventure?
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
I'll have you know I would never -- well, maybe a little...
Naked eye? Then why did you need the glasses?
Have you considered having your tailor sew a few bones to your jacket as well?
Know what would really compliment that tie? A few bones sewn into the jacket. Or the shoes. Shoes look great with bones.
I simply must know the name of your tailor!
You should have your tailor add some bones to your jacket as well.
Now what would really compliment that tie is a few bones sewn into the jacket. Or the shoes. Shoes look great with bones.
Petit a petit, l’oiseau fait son nid...
How many extra baubles did you pack?
A step toward ~name~'s defeat, no matter how small.
Next time I expect more than your ~clothing~.
... and maybe I'll just grow some more flowers! See if I don't!
All this stalling doesn't change the fact that I'll eventually win.
I think you also removed your sportsmanship back there.
So... could I borrow your ~clothing~ to cover up?
Note to self: Carry way more tiny objects on person in future.
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
All lies and slander, I assure you.
What? Come back here, you coward!
Yes, right, the shirt! Show us some skin...
...where I come from, ownership of a mechanized walker is a pretty good indicator that you're up to no good!
Hmmf, I don't like sand! It's coarse, rough, and irritating!
The sword counts? That seems rather unsporting.

state.text: So Jura, that society of only women sounds like this island I was shipwrecked on, one time...
So, Jura, your all-woman kingdom reminds me of a place I got shipwrecked, once...
So, Jura... You keep talking about these "Earth girls" ...when do they show up?
So what's an "Earth girl," anyhow, Jura?
Jura keeps mentioning these "Earth girls"... What's "earth" ?

case.state: What's so important about that silly trinket, ~name~?

state.text: Anyone who goes by "Webmaster" is surely up to no good.
(Well she seems like a typical Rogue!)
(She sounds like the ideal girlfriend for Remington Smisse!)

case.state: Don't worry, Revy! Where I'm from, seems only misfortune can come from picking up other people's favorite weapons.

state.text: Yeah, no way I'm going to touch those. Seems like a good way to get cursed, the way you're acting.

case.state: We should go shopping together sometime!

state.text: Your shirt? Sounds good.
And now for the shirt!

case.state: Everyone knows there should always be more Wakfu and less Stasis. The concept of balance is rotten mulch.
Now for the shirt! Show us some skin, Clover...
Yes, the shirt! Let's get this over with.
Guns. Good choice. Enough of that brambling noise.
Don't worry, Revy. Where I'm from, seems only misfortune can come from picking up other people's favorite weapons.

state.text: ...and fashionable too!

case.state: Meh! I was hoping for more.
That counts? Can I start counting petals?
I think I see how this game is played now.
I see ~name~ doesn't want to make this interesting...
Sure. Cheat your way to victory.
Is this how you treat a princess?
Oh! And ~name~ with the clutch play at the end! Going for the accessory move! Simply -- no, nope, it's just boring.
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
I'll have you know I would never -- well, maybe a little...
~name~, aren't you supposed to be a knight?
~name~, aren't you supposed to be a knight?
grumble grumble...bad enough she hadn't even lost anything yet...
That's strange, I didn't think you looked like an Ecaflip.
Or just go for the ribbon. Sure.
... and it gets -- you know, let's not do that bit after all.
That's not one of those fancy heirloom shushu swords, is it? They always seem to be up to no good.
If I had a kama for all the times somebody and their fancy favorite sword caused trouble... well, I'd be even more wealthy than I already am!
Favorite sword, eh? Gods know I've heard that one before.
The boys got turned into monkeys. Had to be rescued. Good times.

state.text: They turned all our idiots into monkeys. Don't worry, we fixed it. Heh, guess you had to be there.

case.state: Is "Earth girl" some sort of Mejarian slang?
A shapeshifter! Are you a dragon?

state.text: How about you ditch the guns, next!
What about the guns, though?

case.state: Finally! So who pays for all the holes in the roof?
Phew, enough of that lunacy. I wonder how they pay for all the bullet hole repairs in here?
... or your ribbon. A ribbon is fine too.
And I had thought you'd save the accessory until last.
For brambling out loud, how many outfits do you have stuffed in there?
You know, if I'd brought my whole wardrobe too, this wouldn't even be a contest.
Note to self: Pack nine additional outfits next time.

state.text: Pretty! Do it again!

case.state: Or, just go for the ribbon. Sure.
Our boys got turned into monkeys. Had to be rescued. Good times.
Is "Earth girl" some sort of Mejarian insult?
So who pays for all the holes in the roof?
I wonder how they pay for all the bullet hole repairs in here?
(Iops sure love their big red capes...)
Oh, your mother... (What did they tell me about being diplomatic?)
Oh, your mother... (Tu as bien mis les pieds dans le plat, là.)
Petit a petit, l’oiseau fait son nid...
Seems a bit underhanded if you ask me.
Did you remove your sense of adventure, too?
Still looks better on the floor.
New rule: No more counting ~clothing~ as a layer!
La moutarde me monte au nez...
Note to self: Carry ~clothing~ next time. Lots.
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
All lies and slander, I assure you.
...not a man of many words, though.
It's a bit drafty in here...
I expect to see some serious skin! Okay?
I demand something good this time, ~name~!
Are you going to just choose your ~clothing~ ?
Not really doing anything for me...
Too cowardly to choose the good stuff.
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
Mahiru! Hey -- what were you doing with that camera?
I'll have you know I would never -- well, maybe a little...

state.text: You look better without it.

case.state: Just a bit more next time, OK?
Now, on to the bit where I beat you again.
Now back to my glorious victory-in-progress.
I get to keep these as trophies, right?
You know, you can get a much better ~clothing~ in Bonta.
A-a-and onto the pile it goes.
So... Wh-what happens in the Inventory, stays in the Inventory, right guys?
